descriptions:
to manually connect the bot. 
(Could be used for a different "comeback" sound when you were just afk)

set  the command COMMAND_ID to be NEW_COMMAND. 
(where COMMAND_ID is an Integer between 0 and 3 and NEW_COMMAND is the new alias)
-> Syntax: set COMMAND_ID NEW_COMMAND

to add a new Role which triggers the bot
-> Syntax: addRole ROLENAME

to remove an old Role which triggers the bot
-> Syntax: removeRole ROLEPOSITION
to see a list of all currently active roles.

to update the prefix.
-> Syntax: setPrefix PREFIX
to lock your current channel (Only one at the same time per Server).
to open the currently locked channel.

Setting the Channel that is being listened to the desired Channel. 
 Syntax: setChannel [CHANNEL_ID]

Adding Reactions to the Role-Reaction Message. 
  Syntax: addReaction [LIST OF REACTION_NAME]
